amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 601. No funds made available in or through this Act may be used for the continued operation of the Mexican Wolf Recovery program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the continued operation of the Mexican Wolf Recovery program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 258 (Roll no. 558).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
